name: Traffic Car School 3D
description:
Traffic Car School 3D will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway.
Features:
Extremely challenging traffic control levels on readline rushy roads
Control sports cars, big buses & rescue vehicles on signals
High quality 3D graphics with realistic sounds
Amazing gameplay with simple one-tap controls
